definition: greenish yellow/sallow (pale or yellow complexion)/variant of 倉皇|仓皇[cang1 huang2]

sentences.english: I like riding horses, and that alone to experience the grasslands of a greenish yellow.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡騎着馬，獨自去領略草原的那一份蒼黃。

sentences.english: Pale straw color with green hints.
sentences.chinese: 稻草般的蒼黃色澤略帶一抹亮綠。

sentences.english: Heron bird snow white with mountain greenish yellow, forms the striking bright contrast.
sentences.chinese: 鷺鳥的雪白與大山的蒼黃，形成強烈鮮明的反差。

sentences.english: Rain pale seventy years, inside and outside the Great Wall eight miles.
sentences.chinese: 風雨蒼黃七十年，長城表裏八千里。
